title: Create step-familiarity component for Step 3 with confetti
description:
Create the familiarity question component with confetti animation.

File to create: app/fo-03/components/step-familiarity.tsx

Step 3 - Familiarity:
- Headline: How familiar are you with affirmations, {name}?
- Three button options: New / Some experience / Very familiar
- On selection: Show confetti animation + 'Super, {name}!' message
- After brief delay, auto-advance to Step 4

Confetti implementation:
- Use canvas-confetti npm package (install if needed: npm install canvas-confetti @types/canvas-confetti)
- Or use a simple CSS confetti animation
- Trigger on button click before advancing

Reference Framer Motion for animations (already installed).
acceptance_criteria: npm run build succeeds; grep -l 'confetti' app/fo-03/components/step-familiarity.tsx returns the file
closed_reason: Created step-familiarity.tsx with 3 button options (New/Some experience/Very familiar), canvas-confetti animation on selection, success message, and 1.5s auto-advance. Installed canvas-confetti package. Updated fo-experience.tsx to render the component.
